typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as string,
		ReleaseDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FCMoviewsFromRaw
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as string,
		ReleaseDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> VAMoviesFromRaw
source(output(
		{_attachments} as string,
		{_etag} as string,
		{_rid} as string,
		{_self} as string,
		{_ts} as string,
		actors as (name as string)[],
		availabilityDate as string,
		genre as string,
		id as string,
		rating as string,
		releaseYear as string,
		runtime as string,
		streamingAvailabilityDate as string,
		tier as string,
		title as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SRMovieFromRAW
FCMoviewsFromRaw, VAMoviesFromRaw union(byName: true)~> FCandVA
FCandVA, Select1 union(byName: true)~> SRandFCandVA
SRMovieFromRAW select(mapColumn(
		Category = genre,
		MovieID = id,
		Rating = rating,
		ReleaseYear = releaseYear,
		Runtime = runtime,
		MovieTitle = title
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
